title: RGCB Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Facility Manager Posts
description: The Rajiv Gandhi Centre for Biotechnology (RGCB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02Â Facility Manager, Senior Project Associate Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation, PhD. can apply for the RGCB Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit...
